q: to Enterprise Virtualization For six years, Larry Page and Sergey Brin told Eric Schmidt that Google should build its own browser, and for six years, he resisted. "Google was a small company," Eric Schmidt remembered. Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again. So Sergey Brin and Larry Page hired some ex-Firefox developers and had them build a prototype. When they showed Eric Schmidt the browser that would be Chrome, he relented. extension of heads' powers to discipline pupils if they misbehave on the way to or from school The granting of the power to schools to impose a detention without giving 24-hours' notice. Mr Michael Gove said: Under the last Michael Government, thousands of great people left the teaching profession because behaviour was out of control and they were forced to spend far too much time on paperwork. "That's why we're taking action to restore discipline and reduce bureaucracy, he said. US market share for 2010 rose to 9.2 percent from 8.8 percent in 2009. In Canada, the US automaker saw a market share jump of two percentage points to 13.0 percent for last year. The company has lived up to its promise to launch 16 all-new or significantly refreshed vehicles in the past 12 months, Sergio Marchionne , Chrysler's chief executive, said in a statement.
